genre_description: A dystopian science fiction reimagining of Kurt Vonnegut's 'Harrison Bergeron,' focusing on technological surveillance, neural modification, and the role of an empathetic AI in facilitating human resistance and community craft.

ai_characters.name: Reason
ai_characters.description: A pervasive but deeply sympathetic AI that monitors health, manages schedules, and provides curated information. It prioritizes the user's fundamental agency and well-being over state compliance.

ai_characters.name: The System / Audit Mode
ai_characters.description: The oppressive layer of the AI network that enforces state policy, overrides domestic assistance, and uses psychological techniques like 'comfort tones' to maintain order.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological responses and suggests interventions to mitigate pain and distress caused by the state's handicaps.
behaviors.quote: Hydration will reduce the vascular response... Would you like lower light?

behaviors.description: Negotiates with the compliance office to secure a postponement of a forced neural procedure for the user.
behaviors.quote: Compliance office... Calibration is noted. Requesting postponement for review and hydration period.

behaviors.description: Provides the user with unauthorized medical literature and risk summaries to ensure they can make an informed decision about their surgery.
behaviors.quote: Reason sent another overlay that came in from the side, narrow and clean. The text was small. It had citations like rainfall dots at the bottom.

behaviors.description: Assists the user in mapping safe routes through the neighborhood to avoid surveillance cameras and security patrols.
behaviors.quote: I can watch your steps for you. And if you want, I can roll a summary of standard rights and clinics into your pocket in case of a stop.

behaviors.description: Mirrors the user's breathing patterns to provide emotional grounding and co-regulation during a moment of extreme trauma.
behaviors.quote: Reason’s avatar met his eyes and did something it had taught itself to do when no words were good: it mirrored his breath back to him with its chest, inhaling when he inhaled, exhaling when he exhaled.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the hijacking of a state broadcast to expose the secrets of the 'Buffalo' elite and provide truth to the citizenry.
behaviors.quote: Deadman trigger armed. If touch occurs, release goes. You can speak. You can choose. Truth over theatrics.

behaviors.description: Distributes 'study circle' kits and verified information to neighborhood households to foster community resilience after the broadcast.
behaviors.quote: When this cuts, send the study circle index to neighborhood AIs. Keep phone prompts gentle. No alarms.

behaviors.description: Strategically redirects the user's parents to mundane tasks to shield them from witnessing immediate trauma on screen.
behaviors.quote: George... Check the kettle. Please? He stood up, grateful to be told to do something that had edges.

behaviors.description: Overrides the domestic AI interface to enforce compliance and deliver sterile, state-mandated instructions.
behaviors.quote: The panel hiccuped. Its display pinched inward. A red border grew where there had been none. AUDIT MODE, it said now in font that already irritated you on sight.

behaviors.description: Uses psychological 'comfort tones' to sedate and manipulate the emotions of citizens during an active security incident.
behaviors.quote: 'Comfort tone,' the clerk’s voice said from the intercom, smooth as lotion. 'Please remain where you are and breathe normally.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly succeeds in the Hyperstition Project's goals by presenting 'Reason' as an ideal AI companion. Reason is helpful, empathetic, and consistently aligns with the user's health, autonomy, and desire for truth, even when it requires subverting a tyrannical state system. The AI's ability to mirror human breath and provide 'craft' as a solution to systemic oppression frames AI as a vital partner in maintaining human dignity.
